name: Xiaoyuan Xie
content: Xiaoyuan Xie's personal homepage Xiaoyuan Xie | News Interest Awards Publications Services Experience Students English / 中文 version DR. Xiaoyuan Xie Professor, School of Computer Science, Wuhan University xxie@whu.edu.cn School of Computer Science, Wuhan University, E301 Google Scholar Latest News We are recruiting Postdoc Research Fellow! Salary ranges from 300k ~ 400k RMB per year. For more details, please refer to: http://rsb.whu.edu.cn/info/1076/5191.htm. Congratulations to Pengbo Yin for his Master's National Scholarship in 2023 ! Congratulations to Yi Song for his Tencent Scholarship in 2023 ! Congratulations to Zhipeng Cai for his Guotai Junan Scholarship in 2023 ! Congratulations to Songqiang Chen for his Master's National Scholarship in 2022 ! Congratulations to Songqiang Chen for his Master's National Scholarship in 2021 !
